about_the_game:
"

The Complete White Ship Campaign (5E)


Come join the adventure with this comprehensive mega-adventure!

Compiling the full White Ship Campaign adventures series from Folio 14-19, as well as over half a dozen supplemental mini-adventures and the Ports of the Nameless Realms supplement, this is a true monster of a sea-based dungeon and lost island crawl.
Written in 5E mechanics, this huge adventure has been designed to mimic the essence of the classic 1980s 'Orange Spine' hardcovers and has an incredible cover by iconic artist Jeff Easley.
With both 2D & 3D maps, Iconic Characters, new monsters, and more, this isn't something to miss.


This module includes:

  • The Complete White Ship Adventure series from Folios 14-19, designed to take characters from level 1 through 12.
  • 8 Supplemental Mini-Adventures (one or more for each of the six main adventure modules).
  • Ports of the Nameless Realms supplement, a Gazetteer detailing 7 port cities, each with multiple tiers of additional adventure threads.
  • Over 175+ encounters pre-built and ready to be added to maps with a click of a button.
  • Over 550+ story entries with full descriptions and links to images, encounters, treasure parcels, and more.
  • Reference manual containing all adventure material and images.
  • Over 150+ NPCs and Monsters, including additional details for 8 new monsters from Folios 14-19.
  • Over 75+ NPC and Monster tokens, created from the adventure artwork.
  • 18 battle maps with line of sight, lighting, and toggleable DM-only layers detailing room numbers and secret doors.
  • 8 detailed and colorful 3D isometric maps.
"
